title: There’s Always Next Time!
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Uuu, Ruby can’t take it anymore~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>What happened, Ruby-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby got a horrible score on a quiz. If Onee-chan finds out.... Uuu~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Hmm, can’t you just hide it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ruby told her the other day that Ruby will get the quiz back today, so....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I see. But it’s okay~! Scolding is a form of love! It means that she’s expecting you to do better.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Is that so?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Yeah. Whenever Umi-chan or Eli-chan would scold me for getting a bad score on a test, I would feel loved as much as I feel sorry for it♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>T-, that is.... Shouldn’t you be more worried about it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Well, the point is that they have high hopes for you! So let’s do our best next time!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
